thread.title: Prey error, can't advance game!! almost at the end!!

post.author: Moonfrost
post.body:
Hi everyone, I'm having a problem with Prey, I'm almost at the part where you fight the keeper.

When I approach the keeper's room and Tommy screams "KEEPER!" everything goes up as normal until that part where the middle round piece of the floor raises into the air...and nothing, the keeper never appears but I can walk around and all and the music keeps going but the keeper never appears, I know he's not supposed to take too long since I finished this game on 360 back when it came out.

I created a dump of the whole thing, here it is:
Code:
57527 interaction take 6443024 bytes
*--- Map Loaded Successfully ---*
WARNING: script/map_keeperfortress.script(913): Thread 'thread_11': Entity not
found for event 'waitForSilence'. Terminating thread.
--------- Game Map Shutdown ----------
WARNING: idClipModel::FreeTraceModel: tried to free uncached trace model

The error or "warning" at the end intrigues me, it seems the game can't show the keeper's model for some reason though I'm not quite sure, if anybody can help it would be greatly appreciated, I don't want to have to start again, the only autosave I have right now it's right before the fight and so is my normal save!

post.author: Moonfrost
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
bad patch install?


I don't know, but I fixed it by downloading an autosave from somewhere which was exactly where I was so I was able to finish it again, great, great game.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: yes, I agree, great great game.

The Happy Friar wrote:
bad patch install?


I don't know, but I fixed it by downloading an autosave from somewhere which was exactly where I was so I was able to finish it again, great, great game.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: yes, I agree, great great game.

The error or "warning" at the end intrigues me, it seems the game can't show the keeper's model for some reason though I'm not quite sure, if anybody can help it would be greatly appreciated, I don't want to have to start again, the only autosave I have right now it's right before the fight and so is my normal save!

post.author: Moonfrost
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
bad patch install?


I don't know, but I fixed it by downloading an autosave from somewhere which was exactly where I was so I was able to finish it again, great, great game.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: yes, I agree, great great game.
